title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: D. C.", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and brush and black ink, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right corner: D. C.; at upper right corner: 450; at upper center: 39 m/m; on verso at center: Puiforcat [in script].
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Monogram comprised at overlapping "D" and "C" both a similar half-ellipses form drawn in black outline, each with a solid half-ellipse within.
On verso, a Canson and Montgolfier label.
Puiforcat fabrication #:

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: D. C.", ca. 1920–40.
ca. 1920–40. Pen and brush and black ink, graphite on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-83.
